mainHero.title: What to Buy?
mainHero.subtitle: Jo mann kare.
mainHero.description: Discover the ultimate fashion destination for trendsetters. Shop the latest designs from top brands and independent creators.

items.title: Sign In & Set Up
items.description: Create your profile to personalize your shopping experience and keep track of your favorites.

items.title: Shop at Your Pace
items.description: Add to Favorites and check out when you're ready. No pressure.

items.title: List, Sell & Earn
items.description: Join our seller community and earn by showcasing your unique fashion pieces to a wider audience.

items.title: Like, Follow & Buy
items.description: Engage with brands, follow your favorites, and shop seamlessly with a social twist.

features.title: Who We Are
features.subtitle: Making Fashion Accessible Without Breaking the Bank.
features.description: We're a fast-fashion platform offering affordable styles for everyone. Our marketplace is personalized, user-friendly, and connects you with fresh trends from verified brands and designers. Join us in discovering fashion that's affordable, ethical, and empowering.

items.name: Convenience
items.description: Shop online from your favorite fashion brands—all in one place.

items.name: Accessibility
items.description: Access hidden gems and emerging designers that you won’t find anywhere else.

items.name: Risk Reduction
items.description: Enjoy safe, secure shopping with extra layers of trust and transparency.

items.name: Brand Verification
items.description: We thoroughly vet our partners to ensure quality, ethics, and originality.

items.name: Customer Support
items.description: We're here to help—before, during, and after your purchase.

items.name: Collaboration & Growth
items.description: We partner with fashion innovators to fuel growth and creativity in the industry.

sections.name: mann kare
sections.content: mann kare is a curated fashion marketplace where design meets accessibility. Built to empower both creators and consumers, we bring the best of fashion to your fingertips.

sections.name: What's In Store
sections.content: From trendsetting outfits to affordable everyday wear, our store is your one-stop fashion destination.

sections.name: Who We Are
sections.content: We’re a passionate team of creators, developers, and fashion lovers committed to reshaping the way people discover and shop for fashion.
